Author: yomishino
Name: ActionEffectRange
Punchline: 显示技能的影响范围
Description:
This plugin provides a visual cue on the effect range of the AoE action you just used.

May be used as a supplement/replacement to the actions' VFXs in showing effect range related information, such as where has the action landed and how large an area it covered.

Author: Sevii
Description: Auto updates mods and allows for more customization such as color and compositing onto other files
Name: Aetherment
Punchline: Auto-updating and more customizable mods

Author: Asteria Nocturna
Name: Divination.AetheryteLinkInChat
Punchline: 快速传送以进行怪物狩猎和寻宝！
Description: 从游戏聊天信息的地图链接，中显示一个传送链接到最近的以太之光的链接。输入 /alic 来配置插件。

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: AntiAfkKick
Punchline: 防止挂机被自动踢下线，安装后生效，没设置项。

Author: Loskh
Description: 可我还要打本啊！为了不睡过去，我需要补充能量。这时候就轮到我最爱的能量饮料登场了……
Name: AoAoEnergy
Punchline: 宣传是用于新人的怪怪的能量饮料。 (将爆发药特效替换为嗷嗷有劲的RGB)

Author: Sebastina
Name: A Quest Reborn
Description: 游玩由社区制作的自定义任务，或制作属于你自己的任务！

Name: A Realm Recorded Lite
Author: UnknownX, AtmoOmen
Punchline:
A Realm Recorded 精简版
相比原版: 四分之一的体积、更低的待机消耗、全匿名化的录像处理、全副本可录像
Description:
使用 /record 指令打开配置界面
如显示相关指令未解锁, 请去摩杜纳第七天堂找异国的诗人完成任务「回顾英雄诗篇」

Author: Taurenkey (Puni.sh)
Name: Artisan
Punchline: 一个“简单”的生产插件。
Description: 一站式生产插件。非常适合对生产循环几乎没有知识的人。不需要在宏之间切换，求解器会根据实际情况动态工作。此外，还提供方便的方式来依生产清单进行制作或反复制作指定物品。

Author: Det, Taurenkey
Name: AutoHook
Punchline: Makes fishing less (or more) boring
Description: It hooks the fish for you, can you believe it?

Author: Aida Enna
Name: Auto Login
Description: Automatically logs you into a specified character when the game first opens.
Changelog: - Updated for patch 7.3

Author: croizat
Name: CBT ??
Punchline: Extra illegal
Description: Yet another tweaks collection plugin.

Author: developer
Name: AutoQuest
Punchline: Hello world
Description: [测试][未完成][开坑][不确定能不能填完坑] 自动任务

Author: kawaii, NightmareXIV
Name: AutoRetainer
Punchline: Collect and assign ventures to your retainers from the comfort of your bed.
Description: Collect and assign ventures to your retainers from the comfort of your bed.
Changelog:
- Multi Mode expert delivery:
- - Fixed an issue where "Finalize by purchasing" option would trigger 1-minute long lockout
- - Added a possibility to trigger delivery when amount of ventures drops below certain amount
- - Added an option to use Priority Seal Allowance before delivery
- Added possibility to use Shared Estate for Multi Mode teleportation
- - You must have testing version of Lifestream, or it won't work
- - Don't forget to register your shared estate in Lifestream
- - This option is experimental and probably the most untested option that has ever been in AutoRetainer so don't leave unattended
- Added new submarine sectors (by YsEmei)

Author: kawaii, NightmareXIV
Name: Avarice
Punchline: Positional feedback with pixel perfect rear/flank tracking, range indicators, and more.
Description: Positional feedback with pixel perfect rear/flank tracking, range indicators, and more.

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: Battlevest
Punchline: Battle LeveQuest Helper
Changelog: - 7.3 update

Author: LeonBlade
Name: Burning Down the House
Description: 根据坐标移动装修物品，解除游戏限制。

Author: VariableVixen
Name: BetterFateList
Description: Provides a list of all FATEs in the current zone, with their type, sorted by maximum level and distance from you.

Author: he0119
Name: Blind Box
Description:
用来统计盲盒中物品获得情况的插件。
/blindbox 打开盲盒信息界面。
/blindbox config 打开设置界面。
Punchline: 查看盲盒中物品的获得情况。

Author: Faye / NiGuangOwO (适配&优化) / Ookura-Risona (汉化)
Name: Better Occult Crescent & Chest Helper Interface
Punchline: BOCCHI 可以帮助您更加顺利地体验新月岛 (在线安装Only)
Description:
BOCCHI 旨在让您的新月岛体验更加流畅。
- 不再有那些烦人的“跑腿”或“寻找宝箱”了。那是给失败者玩的。
- 一个可爱的小 Fate 和 CE 面板会告诉您它提供了什么奖励，并帮助您自动找到它，哇哦。
- 一个极端非法的“非法模式”，适合那些宁愿摸摸草地或玩有价值内容的游戏的人。
Changelog:
- 优化进入CE区域后等待位置的随机性
- 农怪模式回起点后增加魔寻宝技能

Author: veyn
Name: Boss Mod
Description: 20250916-请支持逆光喵，谢谢喵-画得更全喵
Changelog: 请支持逆光喵，谢谢喵
Punchline: Don't fail at raid mechanics anymore

Author: The Combat Reborn Team / NiGuangOwO（本地化&适配）
Name: Bossmod Reborn
Punchline: 大脑按摩用的(在线安装Only)
Description: 仅禁用了与后期软件冲突的代码（AI可用，自动循环可能失效）

Author: Asgard, Minmoose and Contributors
Name: Brio
Punchline: 增强集体动作体验。
Description: 在集体动作模式中控制参与的角色。

Author: UnknownX
Name: Cammy
Punchline: 一个简单的游戏相机设置修改器
Description:
一个简单的相机修改器，可以更改各种游戏默认值，比如缩放和视角。
这会破解游戏缩放限制，如果你不清楚会造成什么后果，不要安装。

Author: gamous
Name: Chameleon
Punchline: Real fakename in memory
Description: Real fakename in memory

Author: Infi, Anna
Name: Chat 2
Description:
Chat 2 is a complete rewrite of the in-game chat window as a plugin.
It supports:

- Unlimited tabs
- Tabs that always send to a certain channel
- More flexible filtering
- RGB channel colouring
- Completely variable font size
- Sidebar tabs
- Unread counts
- Emotes
- Screenshot mode (obfuscate names)

Name: Currency Tracker
Author: AtmoOmen
Punchline: 记录你全部的货币收支情况 / Track all your currecies
Description:
记录你每一笔货币收支的数额、时间、地点与来源
Track every change of your currecies with its Amount, Time, Location and Source

Author: Risa
Name: Customize+
Description: 允许你通过直接编辑骨骼参数来定制超出FFXIV限制的角色。
Punchline: 突破FF14的限制，自定义你的角色。

Name: Daily Routines
Author: AtmoOmen
Punchline: 帮忙解决一些日常重复性劳动 / Help with some of the daily repetitive tasks
Description:
轻量化、低性能消耗、简单的自动化功能/易用性改动合集, 帮你从一些无意义的重复性工作中解放出来
A collection of lightweight, simple automation features/easy-to-use modules to free you from meaningless repetitive tasks.

Name: Character Data Sync X
Author: goat, AtmoOmen (重写)
Punchline: 用你的主角色设置数据游玩所有角色~
Description:
在插件设置界面选择好主角色后, 自动同步你主角色游戏设置数据至所有角色上
相比原版: 重写了界面, 提供了明确的主角色设置, 不会再动你的原始数据文件, 而是把非主角色的文件读取重定向至主角色

Author: wozaiha
Description: 非满级情况或野外有概率不精确,青魔不适用望周知
Name: DalamudACT

Author: UnknownX
Name: DalamudRepoBrowser
Punchline: Browse and add third party repositories in an instant
Description: An interface for browsing and managing third party repositories.

Name: DCTravelerX
Author: Loskh
Punchline: FF14 国服游戏内跨大区插件
Description:
在选择角色界面, 右键对应角色, 即可进行超域旅行
需要使用 XIVLauncherCN 启动游戏, 不支持 WeGame 端

Author: Anna
Changelog: - Fix hard link detection errors on Linux
Description:
Heliosphere is a mod manager and platform designed to work directly with
Penumbra. It enables efficient downloads and fast installs to let you get back
to the fun part of mods: using them.

Heliosphere supports:
- Direct install to Penumbra
- Compressed and deduplicated (read: small) downloads
- Automatic updates (optional)
- Version history
- Mod changelogs
- Pictures in Penumbra
- And more

Give Heliosphere a try, and see if you can't say goodbye to any old mod
platform you were using before.
Name: Heliosphere
Punchline: An efficient mod manager and platform that integrates directly with Penumbra.
TestingChangelog:
- Fix a possible error in the multiple directory warning
- Fix updates for mods with duplicated files
- Add a first-time-user setup window to make onboarding easier

Macro Mate lets you store and run an unlimited number of macros. You can also bind macros to normal macro slots.

- Use almost any icon in the game for your Macros

A small quest helper plugin designed to automatically do your quests for you where possible. Utilizes navmesh to automatically travel to all quest waypoints and (attempts to) complete all steps along the way (excluding dungeons, single-player duties and combat).

Not all quests are supported.

Author: NightmareXIV, Xenosys
Name: Splatoon
Punchline: Redefining FFXIV navigation with unlimited, precise waymarks.
Description: Splatoon is a powerful accessibility tool. It revolutionizes gameplay with its custom waymark system, offering the ability to create unlimited grouped waymarks, labels, and actor indicators with exacting pixel precision. This feature empowers players by making crucial objects and events more visually discernible, thereby facilitating quicker reactions. However, it's important to note that the plugin does not come pre-loaded with presets. Players have the freedom to craft their own or import existing ones, offering a personalized touch to their gaming experience.
Changelog:
- Fixed an issue where if account for rotation checkbox was not checked, line ends selection was not visible
- Fixed an issue where if line had "account for rotation" disabled, it would display as it had zero width/radius

Author: VariableVixen
Name: WoLua
Description: Write custom chat commands by creating lua scripts

Author: daemitus
Name: ezWondrousTails
Punchline: Adds row probabilities to the Wondrous Tails display.
Description: This plugin prints the probability of getting a row in Wondrous Tails to the in-game display along with the average probability of what would happen if you shuffled.

Author: Team Wrath
Name: Wrath Combo
Punchline: Condenses combos and mutually exclusive abilities onto a single button - and then some.
Description: Turns one action into many! Similar to how PvP actions work, we take an action and build a whole combo out of it. Sometimes it's as simple as a 1-2-3 combo, other times it's a full job rotation. Either way, you'll find something suited for your rotation needs.
Changelog: Please check the project's GitHub or Discord for a full changelog.

Author: attick, daemitus, Khayle
Name: XIV Combo Expanded
Punchline: Condenses combos and mutually exclusive abilities onto a single button.
Description: This plugin condenses combos and mutually exclusive abilities onto a single button. For example, a 1-2-3 combo would become 1-1-1.

Author: attick, daemitus, VariableVixen
Name: XIV Combo Very Expanded
Description: This plugin condenses combos and mutually exclusive abilities onto a single button. To a degree that some would call absurd, but that's why it's all configurable. Let the players decide.

Author: VariableVixen
Name: XivEsp
Description: If you've ever spent ten minutes looking for your hunt target, this is the plugin for you. Set a case-insensitive substring, glob, or regular expression, and all nearby game objects with matching names will be tagged on your screen!

Author: Youri
Name: FFXIV Money Tracker
Punchline: For when you want to know how much you spend/earn in ffxiv!
Description: 记账 For when you want to know how much you spend/earn in ffxiv!

Author: Team Sloth
Name: XIVSlothComboX
Punchline: Condenses combos and mutually exclusive abilities onto a single button - and then some.
Description: Condenses combos and mutually exclusive abilities onto a single button - and then some.
Changelog: 更新内容看更新日志

Author: daemitus, kawaii
Name: Yes Already
Punchline: Clicks Yes in various dialogs you've specified.
Description: Tired of clicking yes in Praetorium? Can't stand using keys in dungeons? Well do I have the plugin for you! Yes Already is specifically designed to click all the annoying dialogs you've grown accustomed facerolling. Just enter the dialog text, and you'll never see it again! Also works with /regex/ and has several built-in modules for dialogs that aren't quite yes/no prompts but act like it (like desynth).

Author: Haselnussbomber
Name: Yo-kai Check
Description: Yo-kai Check is a small plugin to assist you in tracking the rewards of the Yo-kai Watch event.
Punchline: Tracking assistant for Yo-kai Watch rewards
Changelog:
- Added: The server info bar entry can not be clicked to open the plugin window.
- Added: The server info bar entry now shows the locations in which you can farm the medals in the tooltip.
- Added: In the table, the medal count of each weapon now also has a tooltip that shows the locations in which you can farm them. A location displayed in a green color is your current location.
- Added: In the table, the minion name can now be clicked to summon it and will be shown in a green color when it is currently summoned.
- Changed: The server info bar entry is now based on the currently summoned minion (previously it was based on inventory changes - the medals that were added) and will persist between zones until the minion is sent away or the weapon has been acquired.
